General.Name: Roctool
General.Description: RocTool S.A. provides hot and cool technology solutions in France. It offers generators, interfaces, and cooling units; and installation, design, and engineering services. The company provides 3iTech Heat and Cool integration technology for plastic injection, which offers homogenous heating; and provides light induction tooling, a turnkey solution for autoclaves and compression molding presses, and induction dual heating, a carbon fiber composites. It serves medical, beauty, design studio, and car lighting solutions. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Le Bourget du Lac, France.
General.Address: Direction Administrative et FinanciEre, Le Bourget-du-Lac, France, 73370
